name: malachi's basics in math and technoligy
name_original: malachi's basics in math and technoligy
description: malachi's basics in math and technoligy is a game that is made in scratch totally in the old version, it was trash so yeah, controls arrow keys, space to run E to use soda (it will go towards the mouse pointer) this is not a mod of baldi's basics this is a fangame of it, make your own character in the comments bellow so um yeah this seems to be it.
